name: GBSC 5K Smasher
description:
It's time for the GB Studio Central 5K Follower Smasher Event!

Press A to get the squirrel to press the follow button. One press equals 10 follows. Get the follower count up to 5000 to get the secret password. 

Email the password to 5ksmash@gbstudiocentral.com 

First 5 people to send the correct password will win a choice of prizes.

Prizes provided by Incube8 Games, insideGadgets and Ferrante Crafts as well as GB Studio Central.

Game will be available to play via download, with a ROM and Pocket file on Friday, March 10th, at 12:00 PM EST.

Artwork by GumpyFunction

Music by Beatscribe

Best of luck!
